storyInfo: Just when Gambino decides to eliminate the traitor, Capone, Penguin Logistics' fully-deployed intelligence network locates Capone's stronghold and the battle commences.

attributes.content: Boss, Penguin Logistics is on the move.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Of course. I just gave her a few skin deep cuts...
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: But I'm more worried about Capone.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Y- yeah, we haven't been able to reach him. Tried real hard an hour ago.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Where's the last place you got him? The slums?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Er, yeah.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: That's too bad.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Tell all the crews, we're going with the original plan to get Penguin Logistics...
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: But I'm thinkin'... unless something goes wrong, we'll get two or three crews dropping off the grid.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: What do you mean... boss?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Couldn't be... Capone betrayed the Family?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: I get where he's comin' from. All too well.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: We grew up together. And dad had us deal with a traitor, with our own two hands. That was my first time takin' a life. Our first time takin' a life.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: The Siracusa fiasco changed us. The only difference is he turned weak, and I chose the clear path.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: He's gonna sell out the Family. Or I guess he wants to give the Family a new name.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: So what should we do about it?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Penguin Logistics is turning out trickier than I thought. And we can't fight a war on too many fronts.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: I'm thinkin' we deal with our traitor problem first.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: I'm down at the intersection. Nothing special here.
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Roger. Proceed as usual.
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: W- wait! What's the plan here?
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Huh? You screwed up something?
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: No, I just wanna be sure. I really don't know Lungmen at all.
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: It's Sauin. When midnight rolls around, Lungmen kicks off a huge Carnival. The whole town turns out. That's when we rub out Penguin Logistics. Bada bing!
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: Now about the boss...
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Don't ask too many questions. Just do what you're told. Chop-chop.
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: ...it's what it is.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: You ain't gonna kill me, are you?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Of course not. But you gotta take a nap for me like a good boy~
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Texas, you copy?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: It's the same over here. They all split off into little groups.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: But their leader was in the fight himself, which means they've got someone else handing out dispatch orders.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: We just have to cut off that head.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Hey~ Texas?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: We're in the city center, but boy are there a lot of people out here.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Watch for the enemy. They're moving in small teams.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I know~ We'll make sure our friends on the street keep an eye out... Wait, boss? You want to get up on a float? Erm, wait for me...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Croissant, Bison, do you copy?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: So you were talking about that someone else giving dispatch orders, we ran into a little surprise over here.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Bison, get down. Take cover behind that box over there. Don't get yerself seen.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Right. I'll call you back, Texas.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: So where do we go from here?
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: I dunno. Since we cut off the boss... since we cut off Gambino Ricci, we really don't have a choice.
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: Sigh.
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: What's to sigh about? Mr. Capone did so much for us here in Lungmen, and what came of it?
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: Gambino hops on over from Siracusa and makes nothin' but trouble. Not a lick of good's come of him!
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: If we kept to Mr. Capone's plan from the start, we wouldn't be in this mess.
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: We've been over this with the Rat King. Why do we gotta kill anybody? This ain't Siracusa!
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: The boss, I mean the old boss, he's probably just blowin' off steam.
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Well he needs to grow up.
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: (Sounds like trouble in paradise.)
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: (Sure does. This could be good for us, if we...)
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: Hey! Who's there?!
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Huh? A gunshot?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: It's that sniper again! We're exposed!
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: It's the Penguins! Don't let 'em get away!
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: ...Do forgive me, Young Master. This is what the Master of the House has demanded of me.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: But in taking action upon the Young Master, I have placed him in danger...
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: When this matter is concluded, I believe it may be time to retire to the countryside.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: Sigh.
attributes.name: Butler

attributes.content: ...Sounds like they're in trouble.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Exusiai, once you've marked out the gangsters' route, move to meet up with Croissant.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You got it~
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Sora.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Whew... the bad guys are making a lot of moves, but it looks like they're splitting into two teams. Might be a trap...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: It is not so complicated. The enemy is suffering from internal strife. This is an opportunity.
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: Aaaie! You scared me!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: ...Welcome back.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Why'd you have to hack into our private channel? Couldn't you just send us a normal message?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: This was quicker.
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: Where are you now?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: A depressing cafe. I suddenly remembered I was supposed to have today off, so I came out to enjoy the nightlife.
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: I've sent you Croissant and the new boy's coordinates. Lungmen's network speeds are remarkably satisfactory.
attributes.name: Yith

attributes.content: ...understood. Once we've finished our respective missions, we'll move to assist them.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: This is our chance to strike back.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Mr. Capone, the boss's hit on Penguin Logistics looks like it failed.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: What's that meathead worth? I don't even wanna hear his name.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: ...Is that how we do it?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: The Family needs a solid foundation. The name is the least important part.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Did you find the Rat King yet?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Not yet. He really don't leave any tracks around...
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: We gotta be patient. He's like a part of the city. He's Lungmen's shadow. It ain't like we got much time though.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: But we gotta be careful. If the Rat King picks up on what we're doin', we could find ourselves fighting three sides at once.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: It's the same for everyone. If we're locked into a tough spot, the best thing to do is stir up some chaos.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: You got news of Gambino?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: You deaf?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: If you got somethin' to say to me, shouldn't you just say it to my face?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: How did you get in here?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Not everybody's like you. Not everybody can just up and turn their back on an oath made before dad's grave.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Oath? That's just because we were walking the same path. But times have changed, Gambino.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: You broke my heart, Capone. But I'll give you one last chance to explain yourself, as my brother.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Hmph. Seven years ago, when we buried the old boss, you sent me here, to Lungmen.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I came halfway across the world to set up a business that could support the Family, like a backstop.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: But then you had to go and screw up in Siracusa. And what do you do? You hop on over here and take over everything I broke my back to build.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Come on, you ain't gettin' pissed off over some little shit like this. Or you'd've been dead a long time ago.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Say what you want. But today I learned the sharpest fangs in the Family's what's gonna turn around and kill it.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: So you gonna pull out your fangs and snap a collar on yourself? Hah!
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: If you keep runnin' around Lungmen makin' noise like you do, sooner or later the powers that be are gonna get sick of it and wipe us out.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Your deep and heartfelt concern for the Family is moving me to tears, dear Capone.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: The feeling's mutual.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: You're rusty.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: The scars you got in Siracusa are holding you back too.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Just give up. I don't wanna kill you.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: No, you really do.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Heh. You know me too well.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Wh——
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Well lookie here! I just wanted to bust through this wall and make a nice path... but it looks like I found quite a sight.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Sorry to bother ya. You two keep at it. We'll go around.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Hurry! Don't let them get away!
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: ...I think we're out of options.
attributes.name: Bison

attributes.content: How about that. Our troublemakers came right to us. We'll just scoop you up and——
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: What is it this time?!
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Heyy~ We're heere!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What a coincidence, running into everyone.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: So, is it time for a final battle already? Seems a little early?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: It's fine. The sooner we get this whole thing over with, the better.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Just throw them in the river, like the boss said.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: This kind of chaos is just the way I like it.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Tonight's big winner is the one who walks out of here alive.
attributes.name: Capone
